trans-unit.target: Click me to view Missions
Commander, the renegades have supplied us with newly trained troops. Let's take the battle to Malick's front door.
Probes indicate a new Maar Confederate base has just powered up. To locate it:
You successfully defended your base!

Your Warp Gate Capacity appears directly below when you attack.

The bar shows how many units you can warp to the battlefield and how much time remains before the gate closes at the end of the battle.
Build weapons to defend your base and train troops to attack your enemies.
I've narrowed down the location. Let's do some recon!
Click on USE.
Continue
Some of the items you can find in the store are:
Pathetic human, you didn't really think I would send a real army did you? Be warned, I will be back and next time I won't be as forgiving.
Commander, I've detected a dangerous faction base nearby.
Click on SPEED UP.
Explore the planet and attack other bases
Strategic placement is key. Click and drag to pan around. Click once to start building.
Your marines can take them! Attacking a Faction base does not remove your Starter Protection.
To see your build options click the GUN TURRET Icon.

This is the scout view for the enemy base, Commander. If we attack now our rookie troops can gain some much needed experience.
Click attack to open the Warp Gate.

Excellent work, Commander! That should keep our base safe from the enemy factions on the planet.
Speaking of the enemy, I am receiving a transmission from one of them.
Missions button
For decades, the Ceruleans waged relentless war against the allies in the Galactic Union.
Keep Adding Marines Until You Reach Max Warp Capacity
...and SPEED UP construction.
You'll be happy to know I'm the highest functioning AI this side of the Omega Nebula.
Score! You have 10 Platinum in your bank. Platinum is the currency used to buy items from the store.
Awaiting Orders
Warp Gate Capacity
Excellent work, Commander! As well as getting revenge on the Maar, we gained some valuable experience and even managed to recover some of the Maar resources!
Perhaps you haven't heard, but Union negotiations have collapsed.
When the Cerulean home world was finally discovered, a coalition of Union forces prepared to unleash hell.
Click the Marine to warp him into battle.
Tip: Click the ground and drag it to change the view of the base
Scouts were deployed, but they discovered no sign of the Ceruleans. The alien cities had been abandoned.
You successfully attacked an enemy base!
Your Warp Gate is recharging one of its three warps so you can launch two more attacks right now.
Take Control
Click the BUILD Button to start building your Gun Turret.
Long range sensors were damaged in a recent battle. Let's use the short range scanners to track down those Confederates.
First we need to select the troop to take into battle. Click the Marine to select them.
Click the Scout button
I'm receiving a transmission from... one of the old factions! Processing...

Intel indicates the Maar Confederacy isn't the only threat. The Erazi Syndicate and Helio Legion are regrouping, too. These three factions united to fight the Ceruleans. Without a common enemy, they've traded in peace for a power grab.

There are other factions on this planet, all fighting for control. I suggest we teach Governor Malick a lesson and take the fight to him.
Let's open the combat list to scout his base.
Click to continue
Can you stop them from destroying Cerulea?
Buildings take time to finish constructing. If only we had an accelerator to speed up the process...
Drag the slider and double tap on the base to send troops into battle
Getting Started
Tap on the battlefield to deploy your troops. Once in battle, they will automatically attack their targets.
Let's go to the Map.

Attacking enemies, training troops and expanding your base will all give you essential experience and help you on your path to dominating this sector!
That's all for now, Commander. Good luck!
Accelerators will reduce the time of any task.
Cerulea IV
7 days
Nothing says "back off" quite like an automated Gun Turret. Click the DEFENSE Tab to find the Gun Turret.
Let's just cut to the chase.
Resources
After several years, the Union established bases to extract resources and research advanced alien technology.
I guess that's as good a place as any.
Rest assured Commander, I won't soon forget this insolence.
I've completed running risk assessment diagnostics and compiled a list of recommended mission objectives.
If we're going to survive, we have a lot of work to do, commander.
Meaning, your base lies in Confederate territory.
KIRA here. I've been assigned to assist you in the occupation.
Tap to place the building Tap and hold to move the view
Command an army of elite soldiers and epic war machines

Don't worry Commander. Our defense system is operational and will automatically target any invading forces.
Let's show Governor Malick we aren't going anywhere.

Commander, welcome to Cerulea IV. My name is K.I.R.A, the most advanced android ever constructed and I am here to get your base operational.
First, I recommend we get our defense system online.
Click the Attack button
Place the building on the green square by clicking on the base
Pledge allegiance to the Confederacy this instant, or join the other renegades in the brig.
Now we're cooking with antimatter! Defense network initializing...
Let's just cut to the chase...
The good news? War has its spoils. To get your rewards click the CLAIM Button.
Welcome to Cerulea, Commander. I'm Kira, the brains of the operation. I suggest we build up our defenses.
Find a place where your Marine can warp in.
GOVERNOR MALICK: Insolent rogue! You are occupying Maar territory. Prepare to be reduced to a pile of smoldering rubble.
Speed Ups
Hello? Is this thing on?
Commander, welcome to
However, the struggle for Cerulea has just begun. Three major factions now fight for total domination of this world: Maar Confederacy, Erazi Syndicate, and the Helio Legion.
Play!
Commander #NAME#, I presume. Perhaps you haven't heard, but Union negotiations have collapsed.
Attack Successful
Don't expect fireworks until construction is complete.
Build and defend your base from hostile forces
You can deploy multiple waves of troops. They automatically attack their targets.
I don't know who you are and quite frankly I don't care. You are invading on Maar territory and for that you must pay the consequences.
Surrender now, and you'll still wake up tomorrow... albeit in the brig.
This is Governor Malick of the Maar Confederacy. I demand to speak to whoever's squatting in that hovel of a base.
Just to be safe, let's build up your defenses by clicking the BUILD button.
Do you read?
For starters, I say we launch a counter-attack against those backstabbing goons of the Maar Confederacy!
Click the COMBAT button
Each time you complete a mission you will be given rewards. Clicking the missions button will let you claim the rewards and show you what missions are available.
Drag the slider to send all Troops into battle
Click the Factions tab
Click on the Gun Turret.
